Without the summon you cannot solo anything, even a group setting is almost pointless at low levels due to the influx of running out of spells. So, I've come for the experts help again, ...I literally cannot think beyond the first 3 levels. I wanted to make something good for not only PvE but PvP as well, even if it's just that support hitting guy in order to help kill the enemy, via barrage of magic missles which I got up to 12-16 dmg per missle once, but that's not a great achievement considering the counters. My other problem is whether or not if I should break into another class as well.
